content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in München, let me begin with a significantly higher figure than what you may expect, setting the basis for our negotiation. I propose a monthly rent of 1500 Euros.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal. However, considering my circumstances as a responsible and smart student, I find this amount excessively high for my budget. I would like to negotiate a lower rate.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you underestimate the prime location and exceptional quality of this apartment, catering to discerning tenants. 
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
